SESSION_ID.description: session id needed add your session id here

SUDO.description: sudo numbers with country code Example 27686881509

HANDLERS.description: prefix for commands/ using false command work without .

RMBG_KEY.description: Remove bg api key required get it here(https://www.remove.bg/api)

MENU_TYPE.description: Type image for image menu type video for video menu

AUTHOR.description: Sticker Pack AUTHOR required Example Diegoson

ALIVE.description: Alive message {image/link}, {sender} can also be used

MODE.description: Work Type set public or private

MONGODB_URI.description: A secret String for Mongodb Connection.(Required)

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Heroku app name, same as above entered
